name: Speedy Space Slider
description:
--Controls--

Z - Swap Gravity

X-Fire Gun

--Game Play--

Swap your gravity to avoid being hit by the ever increasing number of enemies.

The longer you survive the more powerful your guns will become.

--Notes--

This game was made for the -  2 Bits to infinity ~ 2 Button Jam.

--Credits--

Song used -

Lights Out - Joshua McLean
